translation: He was called the Buddha's Sun and Universal Light. The teacher sang a verse about the boat-covering gong-an saying.
"The clear world is a long way from the main river.
A single boat's worth of work weighs a thousand pounds.
There are few pedestrians on the Chujing road.
The vast ocean is hardly the same depth as a square inch.
He later passed away.
He was buried at the Dongun Pagoda.
He had a life span of 84 years.
He was sixty-eight years old.
Yuan Jue, a Hanlin scholar, wrote the inscription.
He wrote an inscription.
Wu Deng Quanshu, Volume 50
